translated: This was said by the Blessed One, said by the Arahant, so I have heard:

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukha somanassa bahulaḥ viharati yoni ca ssa āraddhā hoti āsavānam khayāya
translated: “Monks, a monk endowed with two things dwells in comfort in the here-&-now and has a pleasant destination in the next.

original: Saṁvejanīyesu ṭhānesu saṁvejanena, saṁviggassa ca yoniso padhānena.
analyzed: sa vejanīyesu ṭhānesu sa vejanena saviggassa ca yonisaḥ padhānena
translated: Being alarmed at what should cause alarm and, being alarmed, practicing in line with the Dhamma.

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti.🔽Etamatthaṁ bhagavā avoca.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukha somanassa bahulaḥ viharati yoni ca ssa āraddhā hoti āsavānam khayāya ati  etam attham bhagavān avoca
translated: A monk endowed with these two things dwells in comfort in the here-&-now and has a pleasant destination in the next.”🔽This is the meaning of what the Blessed One said.
The monk who is ardent & alert
he will reach the ending of stress.”

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
translated: This is the meaning of what the Blessed One said in “Thus have I heard.”
The tenth.🔽The first sub-chapter is finished.
Two monks, and the one to be trained,
the one to be trained in the other’s presence;
and the last is with joy.
